title: riot doesnt know who to stop toxicly
body: I have had played league for more than 2 year and first year I got my account banned when all I was doing was letting my friends try out my champ and than I go into games and have people int because they got supp how aren't these guys banned at all

replies.body:
Your account was locked due to compromise, not due to sharing. I can see that you submitted a ticket last year right after it was locked and this was the response from support:

"Hiya!

First off, don't panic! We put a lock on the account when we saw a bunch of strange activity, and we can fix it up no problem!

But for security reasons, we are not able to assist with any Account Recovery related actions while you are logged into our support site, so if you can give me an email not linked to any League of Legends account I will set up a new ticket with that address!

Let me know if you have any questions!"

As it's been a while since this ticket was lodged it was closed permanently. But if you submit another ticket and follow the instructions from support they can get your account back to you.
Did OP just admit to account sharing?

Im a supp main, rather it because i can usually carry. 
But riot wont do anything about that toxic behaviour because if they did, company would go into the red because theyd lose probs about 99% of the playerbase.

Toxic players and Venting players are not the samething.
Issue isnt the fact that riot wont do anything about it. THE ISSUE IS THAT IT IS DONE BY A FRAGGING BOT! 
We use to have tribunal on NA when there was no OCE.

The tribunal was okay but if you just did what I use to and BAN EVERYONE. You would end up with a 80% rate. The bot on the other hand.. Only goes with key words.
Not context. So lets say I ring my mate and I use LoL client to do it. Then he picks up the phone and I say " Hey dip shit. How are going to eat dk today " the bot is will automatically think this is toxic and ban me for it.
But with Tribunal and players doing the judgement. They won't ban me for it as it is just 2 mates giving shit to one another.

Toxic player's going by google since Riot has never nor will weight in on this so we have no real basic idea what toxic is.
Toxic in gameplay mechanics refers to something that in loosest terms "is only fun when you play it, and totally unfun to play against." It usually refers to mechanics that have very very costly counterplay, or limited counterplay in general. When Eve could come up to you under incredibly fast movespeed with her R and stun you on the first hit from stealth, this is an example. You couldn't have the whole map pink warded all game, and you couldn't have oracles on the whole team all game.

Quoted from [here](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4017082) as you can see for your self it was a player not Riot.
So the other issue is.. 
WHAT IS TOXIC? Just because someone said you are a joke.. Doesnt make it toxic. Heck if that was the case. Everytime someone said to me I was unskilled / Bad or just dumb. I would have them ban for toxic.
So really how do you stop something when you have no idea what it is.
